physics.motor: No sustainable motor. Uses others' energy through aura penetration
physics.energy_mechanics: Designed to guide and direct others' energy, not generate their own. Absorb and amplify others' energy.

strategy.name: Wait for Invitation
strategy.description: Wait to be recognized and invited before offering guidance, especially in major life areas
strategy.mechanics: Projectors have penetrating auras that see deeply into others. But this gift is only received when invited. Without invitation, guidance is rejected or resented.
examples: Wait to be invited for job, don't apply cold
Wait to be asked on date, don't pursue aggressively
Wait for recognition of your expertise before offering deep guidance

signature.name: Success
signature.description: When living correctly and recognized, Projectors experience success and feel seen

not_self_theme.name: Bitterness
not_self_theme.description: When not following Strategy, Projectors become bitter
causes: Not being recognized for their gifts
Trying to keep up with Generator pace

failure_states.diagnosis: Offering unsolicited guidance, not being seen
failure_states.correction: Stop giving advice unless asked. Focus on self-mastery and study.
failure_states.experiment: For 14 days, give zero unsolicited advice. Only respond to direct questions. Track bitterness.

failure_states.diagnosis: Trying to work like a Generator (8+ hour days)
failure_states.correction: Work 3-4 focused hours. Rest deeply. Release Generator pace expectations.
failure_states.experiment: Work only 4 hours per day for 1 week. Notice energy levels.

failure_states.diagnosis: Not studying deeply enough, not mastering a system
failure_states.correction: Become expert in one system. Master it. Recognition comes from mastery.
failure_states.experiment: Choose one system. Study 1 hour daily for 30 days. Notice who starts asking questions.

authority_types: Environment/No Inner Authority (test in different spaces)

with_generator.dynamics: Projector guides Generator's energy. Powerful when Generator invites guidance.
with_generator.friction_points: Projector tries to guide without invitation. Generator feels controlled.
with_generator.harmony_keys: Generator: invite Projector's perspective. Projector: wait for invitation.

with_manifestor.dynamics: Two non-energy types. Can deeply understand each other's need for rest.
with_manifestor.friction_points: Both waiting for the other to initiate invitation/inform.
with_manifestor.harmony_keys: Manifestor: inform Projector of plans. Projector: recognize Manifestor without trying to guide.

with_projector.dynamics: Two guides. Deep recognition possible but no energy to sustain.
with_projector.friction_points: Both exhausted, both waiting for invitation, neither generating momentum.
with_projector.harmony_keys: Recognize each other's gifts. Don't expect other to energize. Bring in Generator energy for work.

with_reflector.dynamics: Projector sees deeply, Reflector mirrors completely. Beautiful witnessing.
with_reflector.friction_points: No sustainable energy. Can get lost in reflection without action.
with_reflector.harmony_keys: Appreciate mirroring gifts. Bring in energy types for manifestation.

with_manifesting_generator.dynamics: MG's speed needs Projector's guidance. Projector helps MG optimize.
with_manifesting_generator.friction_points: MG moves too fast for Projector's guidance. Projector tries to slow MG down.
with_manifesting_generator.harmony_keys: MG: invite Projector's optimization. Projector: let MG skip steps.

career_alignment.ideal_work: Guiding, managing, directing, teaching, consulting - work with people's energy
signs_of_right_work: 3-4 hours of focused work feels complete
signs_of_wrong_work: Trying to keep up with Generator pace

rest_requirements.sleep: Projectors need more rest than energy types. 8-9 hours minimum. Release Generator guilt.
rest_requirements.work_rhythm: 3-4 hours of focused work, then rest. Not designed for 8 hour workdays.
rest_requirements.restoration: Deep rest required to process absorbed energy. Alone time essential.

communication_style.speaking: Incisive, penetrating, seeing into systems and people
communication_style.listening: Natural mastery of reading between lines, seeing what others miss
communication_style.decision_making: Depends on Authority type. Often needs time and external sounding board.

conflict_resolution.pattern: Projector bitterness when guidance isn't received or recognized
conflict_resolution.healthy_approach: Express when feeling unseen. Request recognition. Wait for invitation to guide.
conflict_resolution.unhealthy_pattern: Suppress bitterness, give more unsolicited advice, become increasingly bitter

core_wound.description: Being ignored, guidance rejected, not being seen for gifts
core_wound.conditioning: Told to work harder, be more productive. Shamed for needing rest.
core_wound.healing: Recognize that recognition comes from mastery, not effort. Rest is power.

practices: Master a system (Human Design, astrology, business, etc.)

spiritual_pathway.essence: Success through recognition. Projectors are here to guide others efficiently.
spiritual_pathway.transcendence: When Projector is recognized and guides from clarity, they become pure seeing. No personal agenda.
